--- "M. R. Williams" <amacobra@...> wrote:

---------------------------------
Greetings,

  I would like to pick the brains of the knowledgable
members of this list.  
I am trying to remember the name of the straw sandals
wore by the Japanese 
that tie around the ankle and calf.  They are usually
relatively thin.  If 
anyone could help me by naming this item and, if
possible, tell me where I 
could acquire a pair I would be muchly obliged.


Peace,

Matt Williams
